object.name: BotCommandScopeChat
object.description: Represents the scope of bot commands, covering a specific chat.
object.html_description: Represents the scope of bot commands, covering a specific chat.
object.rst_description: Represents the `scope <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#botcommandscope>`_ of bot commands, covering a specific chat.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername). Channel direct messages chats and channel chats aren't supported.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername). Channel direct messages chats and channel chats aren't supported.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format :code:`@supergroupusername`). Channel direct messages chats and channel chats aren't supported.
annotations.name: chat_id
